short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emoji sidebar - instant search emoji keyboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The world's best sidebar emoji keyboard for Chrome.

Click to the extension icon to open emoji sidebar.

Hover on emojis to see their meanings.

Click on emoji to copy it to the clipboard and/or add it to the textarea field.
